doc.title: Night Gallery

credit.role: Dr. Moreau in 'Island of Lost Souls' clips
The Sayer of the Law in 'Island of Lost Souls' clips

doc.plot: Similar in format to Serling's much more famous "Twilight Zone" series. Each week we get a new tale, represented by a painting in an old museum. Whereas the tales in "Twilight Zone" were more science fiction, these tales have a darker, more horrific edge.
